title: Bass–Quillen conjecture
summary: In mathematics, the Bass–Quillen conjecture relates vector bundles over a regular Noetherian ring A and over the polynomial ring A [ t 1 , … , t n ] {\displaystyle A[t_{1},\dots ,t_{n}]} . The conjecture is named for Hyman Bass and Daniel Quillen, who formulated the conjecture.[1][2]
